A Glyph that is guaranteed to not appear in the terminal, but will avoid null pointer exceptions from being thrown by the renderer.

The region which spans from the origin (0, 0) in the upper-left corner to the maximum dimensions on the x- and y-axis.

The rows of GStrings which make up this frame.
BufferedFrame - Class in jtxt.emulator
Similar to a video frame, this is a frame of Glyphs that represents the entirety of characters that are available to be fetched and painted to the screen by the renderer at a specific point in time.
